resources.string:
1- Once you tap on create/log in button, you will be directed to the welcome screen where you will see an instructions button. 
 2- After that there will be a button named "Shop Online" ,if you tap it you will be able to find a variety of shoes.
 3- One you tap on the Shop Online button you will be directed to another screen where you will see all the shoes available. 
 4- You can scroll through all the shoes available and you can add new shoe by tapping on the button with a plus on it.
